
#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;


int main()
{
    int t,a,b,n,i;
    long long int f[100000];
    cin >>t;
    while(t--)
    {
        cin >> a >> b >>n;
        memset(f,0,sizeof(f));
        f[0]=a;
        f[1]=b;

        for ( i = 2 ; i<=n;i++)
        {
            f[i] = f[i-1]+f[i-2];
        }

        cout << f[n-1] << endl;
    }
}
